entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -39.6°C

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 41.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 41. Wind chill minus 58 this morning and minus 52 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
